name: Pack My Pals
description:
A pack of Blue Footed Booby birds got lost in the cite.Bored,cold and hungry these blue-footed dummies can't survive without each other.Find the booby pals and get the hell out of this place.

This is a Game Jam game made in 48H under the theme of "Pack" in the Quarantine Jam event. It's an Adventure Puzzle game.

Game Developer: Layal HF

Game Artist : Habib Rahal
